mapper.select: SELECT s.svc_nm, b.day_obj_yn, b.wk_obj_yn, b.mth_obj_yn, b.day_rcv_itm_cnt, 'D-'||b.disp_strd_cd as disp_strd_cd, b.day_rcv_expt_tm, b.wk_rcv_expt_cnt, b.wk_rcv_expt_dow_cd, c.comm_cd_nm wk_rcv_expt_dow_cd_nm, b.wk_rcv_expt_tm, b.mth_rcv_itm_cnt, b.mth_rcv_expt_day, b.mth_rcv_expt_tm FROM EISUSER.BPM_MGNT_RSLT_BAT_INFO_RGST b, EISUSER.COM_SVC s, EISUSER.COM_COMM_CD c WHERE b.svc_id = s.svc_id AND b.wk_rcv_expt_dow_cd = c.comm_cd_id(+) AND c.comm_cd_grp_id(+) ='PBPM_C_00008'
